title: ethash_opencl.go:563 c.ethash.Light.current undefined
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
OS & Version: Linux Debian Jessie 4.2.6-1 x86_64 GNU/Linux
Commit hash : e189fb839c688b418b43ad6533111c246c109a93
#### Expected behaviour

should compile
#### Actual behaviour

doesn't compile:

github.com/ethereum/ethash
Godeps/_workspace/src/github.com/ethereum/ethash/ethash_opencl.go:563: c.ethash.Light.current undefined (type _Light has no field or method current)
Makefile:16: recipe for target 'geth' failed
make: *_\* [geth] Error 2
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

export GO_OPENCL=true
export GPU_MAX_ALLOC_PERCENT=95
make -j12 geth
#### Backtrace

build/env.sh go install -v -ldflags '-X main.gitCommit=e189fb839c688b418b43ad6533111c246c109a93' -tags opencl ./cmd/geth
